title: Verify that We are able to add/update/delete Header Insertion for predefined apps
custom_steps:
Enable generic_header_insertion feature

Go to tenant web ui
Go to settings->Manage->Header Insertion
click on "Add New Key-Value Pair"
click on "Select application" dropdown menu
Create the predefined app Egnyte
Update the key-value pair
Delete the key-value pair
custom_expected: User should be able to create/update/delete predefined apps with custom key-value pairs when generic_header_insertion feature is enabled
